p: The results of this study showed that the seropositive rate was more than 95% in 15–29 year age group and gradually began to decrease from the ages above 30 years to 75.24% in the 55–59 age group, followed by 80.82% in the 65–69 age group, and 59% in the 70 or older age group. The seropositivity and titers for NTAbs to JEV revealed appropriate levels for all age groups above 15 years old in Korea.
